Flag of Antarctica
used by Antarctica
current since never
created by Graham Bartram
format 3:2
shape
12 ↑
colors blue, white
other characteristics flag includes a map of the territory of Antarctica
English: One of several flag proposals for Antarctica.
Deutsch: Flaggenvorschlag für die Antarktis.
Español: Un de varios banderas propuesta de Antártida.
Italiano: Una delle bandiere proposte per l'Antartide.
Plattdüütsch: Vörslag för ene Flagg vun Antarktika.
  • Source: Sodipodi's Clipart Gallery.
  • Author: Tobias Jakobs (in the public domain).
